kind: struct

Test Unmarshal into slice of pointer.

>>>
[slice "ptr_struct"]
string = ptr_struct 0
int = 1

[slice "ptr_struct"]
string = ptr_struct 1
int = 2

[slice "ptr"]
string = string 0
int = 1
bool = true
duration = 1s
time = 2021-02-28 03:56:01

[slice "ptr"]
string = string 1
int = 2
bool = false
duration = 2s
time = 2021-02-28 03:56:02

<<<
[section]
time = 0001-01-01 00:00:00
string =
duration = 0s
int = 0
bool = false

[section "struct"]
string =
int = 0

[slice "ptr"]
bool = true
bool = false
duration = 1s
duration = 2s
int = 1
int = 2
string = string 0
string = string 1
time = 2021-02-28 03:56:01
time = 2021-02-28 03:56:02

[slice "ptr_struct"]
string = ptr_struct 0
int = 1

[slice "ptr_struct"]
string = ptr_struct 1
int = 2
